text:
YourMechanic| Mountain View, CA| Fullstack Engineer| Onsite| Multiple Positions Available! https://www.yourmechanic.com/careers

YourMechanic connects mobile mechanics to customers who seek affordable, convenient, and honest car repair services at their home or office, seven days a week.

We're expanding nationwide and we are looking for software engineers who, like Mechanics, enjoy looking 'under the hood' and can work across the entire product spectrum, to join our core development team. Feel free to reach out to

Tech: Ruby on Rails for back end. Postgresql DB, with Redis for in memory caching. React for front end. Swift for iOS app. Java for Android app. Special purpose modules in nodejs, golang and tomcat.

kdurant@yourmechanic.com to learn about this role and others! All open positions: https://www.yourmechanic.com/careers
